thread.title: Travellers stranded as German workers strike over pay

title: Travellers stranded as German workers strike over pay
text:
Travellers stranded as German workers strike over pay 12:15pm EDT - 01:43 
Hundreds of flights were cancelled at four German airports, including the biggest hub Frankfurt, on Tuesday as ground staff and other public sector workers staged walkouts across the country to increase the pressure in a pay dispute.   
Hundreds of flights were cancelled at four German airports, including the biggest hub Frankfurt, on Tuesday as ground staff and other public sector workers staged walkouts across the country to increase the pressure in a pay dispute.  //reut.rs/2qlKlOJ
